channel.title: Just2006 - A Full Remake of Runescape in 2006
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=18pt]Just2006[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[center][size=8pt][b]To start of with you will probably be thinking, Why are you any different from the other 100's of people working on a 2006 Remake? Well here is your answer. Our developers are coding in the cloud, which means all our developers can be working on the same piece of code at one time, allowing us to work a lot faster. They are also updating their progress and completed tasks in a cloud document which only the developers can access. We are aiming to have a Major testing phase by early 2013 and a playable release with no resets by mid 2013. We will be hosting the worlds in a cloud, meaning that each world will be hosted on different servers on our network and world servers can easily be upgraded!
Extra details: The exp rate is 1x! No higher! Cut off date is may the 15th! Staff will be professional and must be 15 or over! More details to come....
[/b][/size][/center]
[center][b][u][size=14pt]A bit about myself[/size][/u][/b][/center] [center][b][size=8pt]I am currently studying IT Level 3 Extended and will be specializing in networking for my second year at college. I am 16 an hope to be working with networks and systems within the games industry. I plan on heading straight to work after my second year at college although I am not totally sure yet.[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][u][size=14pt]Staff List[/size][/u][/b][/center] [center][b][size=8pt]Max (Mod Max) - Project Manager and Network Adminstrator Liam (Mod Liam) - Community Administrator Open - Head Content Developer Open - Head Website Developer Open - Content Developer Open - Content Developer Open - Content Developer Open - Website Developer Open - Head Forum Administrator Open - Linux Specialist Open - MySQL Administrator[/size][/b][/center]
[center][u][b][size=14pt]Whats done and whats not?[/size][/b][/u][/center] [center][b][size=8pt]
Green = Complete
Orange = Started
Red = Not Started
To be added shortly.
[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][u][size=14pt]Screenshots[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[center][size=8pt][b]To be added as progress is made.[/b][/size][/center]
[center][u][b][size=14pt]Application[/size][/b][/u][/center]
[center][b][size=8pt]We are not recruiting anyone we can find, we are looking for people experienced in the role they have applied for. You MUST have skype and a mic. You must be able to spend 10 hours a week on the project at a minimum. Must be able to work to the deadline of a testing phase being released early 2013. You must have a Google account to access some of our cloud documents.
Please !!!!PM!!!! me with the following (Do not post your application below):
Real first name: Age: Where you are from (US, UK ect)?: Role applying for?: Experience in the role: How many hours a week can you spend working on this project?: Why apply here and not somewhere else?: Have you ever worked on a remake?: Skype name: Ever worked with CloudIDE?
That is all for the application! [/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][u][size=14pt]News/Updates[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=8pt]Update - Thread released![/size][/b][/center]

item.title: Just2006 - A Full Remake of Runescape in 2006
item.dc:creator: @ItzMax ItzMax
item.description:
@ItzMax wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Just2006[/size][/center]

[center][size=8pt][b]To start of with you will probably be thinking, Why are you any different from the other 100’s of people working on a 2006 Remake? Well here is your answer. Our developers are coding in the cloud, which means all our developers can be working on the same piece of code at one time, allowing us to work a lot faster. They are also updating their progress and completed tasks in a cloud document which only the developers can access. We are aiming to have a Major testing phase by early 2013 and a playable release with no resets by mid 2013. We will be hosting the worlds in a cloud, meaning that each world will be hosted on different servers on our network and world servers can easily be upgraded!

Extra details:
The exp rate is 1x! No higher!
Cut off date is may the 15th!
Staff will be professional and must be 15 or over!
More details to come…

[/b][/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]A bit about myself[/size][/center]
[center][size=8pt]I am currently studying IT Level 3 Extended and will be specializing in networking for my second year at college. I am 16 an hope to be working with networks and systems within the games industry. I plan on heading straight to work after my second year at college although I am not totally sure yet.[/size][/center]

[center][b][size=8pt]We are not recruiting anyone we can find, we are looking for people experienced in the role they have applied for. You MUST have skype and a mic. You must be able to spend 10 hours a week on the project at a minimum. Must be able to work to the deadline of a testing phase being released early 2013. You must have a Google account to access some of our cloud documents.

Please !!!PM!!! me with the following (Do not post your application below):
